description.description: Credit scores help you track your borrowing health.

posts.title: How to improve your credit score

description.text: There are a few thing you can do to help improve your credit score. Or if your credit score's looking healthy, we've also outlined some ways you can maintain it.
There is no universal 'good' or high credit score in the UK! We've explained what a credit score actually is, how to improve it and all the many myths you've probably heard about credit scores...

posts.title: What are credit checks or credit searches?

description.text: Credit checks can be confusing (sometimes they’re even called credit searches – which only adds to the confusion). We’ve outlined what a credit check actually is, the different types you’ll find and when you might need one.

posts.title: How to check your credit score

description.text: Checking your credit score can help you find out what your borrowing health is like and how you might look to potential lenders. We've outlined how to check your credit score!

posts.title: Soon, you’ll be able to see your credit score in Monzo

description.text: See your credit score – for free – in just a few taps. We'll update you monthly, and tell you what could have affected your score. All inside Monzo. Coming soon!
